hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select meob.eoor_customer_order_no || '-' || meob.eoor_customer_code as key from MID_EO_ORDER_B2B meob where 1 = 1 <<and meob.eoor_customer_code = :customerNo>> <<and meob.eoor_customer_order_no = :customerOrderNo>> <<and meob.eoor_customer_order_no in (:customerOrderNos)>> <<and meob.ediflag not in (:notFlags)>>
